content: welcome to krissy s over the mountain crochet create a stunning and comfortable chemo cap for your loved ones with the tiny pink pearl chemo cap crochet pattern this is designed for those who have lost their hair so the size will be small if you have a full head of hair 1 lion brand truboo yarn sport weight #3 2 crochet hook size f 3 5 mm 3 easy-to-follow instructions 4 mini popcorn for added texture 5 3 sizes 6 suitable for gifting or charity projects this design was specially crafted for the cancer challenge by sweet potato 3 ensuring both style and warmth during challenging times the pattern features the exquisite lion brand truboo yarn which adds a luxurious touch with its sheen the mini popcorn makes the cap look like it s adorned with tiny pink pearls this pattern is designed to be soft comfortable and stylish making it an ideal gift for cancer patients or those with alopecia the mini popcorn adds a unique texture and the lion brand truboo yarn gives the cap a beautiful sheen that resembles tiny pink pearls craft your own sweet pearl chemo cap and provide comfort and warmth to those in need make a difference with your crochet skills and show your support for cancer warriors copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright© krissys over the mountain crochet 2023 do not sell alter or redistribute this pattern in any way or form you have my permission to sell your finished product but you are responsible for the finished product no mass production
